about_the_game:
Is your game going retro? Are you harkening back to the golden age of swords, magic, and adventure? Then the “Dr Watson’s 16 Bit Orchestra” pack is for you!

“Dr Watson’s 16 Bit Orchestra” is created in a way to recreate those classic early 90s RPG soundtracks. Using samples created via retro tech, this pack will give you the music that will fit your classic fantasy aesthetic!

The Quest Essentials pack contains 13 pieces of music in multiple formats that are built to loop perfectly and help sculpt the ambience of your game.

Contents:

2x Battle Themes
2x Shop Themes
4x Town Themes
2x Dungeon Themes
3x Overworld Themes

Enough to see you through your retro quest!
